kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.1/cli/args/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

test.name: Verify Checkout Paid Externally without discount and without tip

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Exit For Loop If
kw.doc: Stops executing the enclosing FOR loop if the ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Get element attribute using given attribute: name, value,...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: And Select And Store Services Price

kw.doc: Returns list of [http://selenium-python.readthedocs.io/api.html#module-selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement|WebElement] objects matching ``locator``.

kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

test.doc: Verify full checkout flow without any voucher or tip applied, paid externally, and ensure total amount remains unchanged with confirmation displayed.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.
